questions.question: When approaching a stopped emergency vehicle with activated lights on a two-way two-lane roadway, you MUST:
choices: Stop at least 200 feet behind the emergency vehicle
Slow down to a speed below the posted speed limit
Move over to the left half of the roadway

questions.question: Always wear your shoulder belt:
choices: Very loosely, so you can move freely

questions.question: If you park facing uphill on a street with a curb and turn the front wheels to the left:
choices: The curb will stop the car from rolling into the street
Front of the car will roll into the street if the brakes fail
Back of the car will roll into the street if the brakes fail

questions.question: This sign tells you that a left turn is against the law. It also prohibits:
When you see this sign:
choices: Other traffic lanes come together with your lane

questions.question: Guide or information signs helping you to get off a highway at the correct exit has which color?
A dashed white line between lanes of traffic means:
choices: Stay in your lane at all times
You may cross it to change lanes if it is safe

questions.question: When driving at night in heavy traffic, you should use the following:
When may you drive at the maximum speed indicated by a speed limit sign?
choices: Only on divided highways, or highways designed for one-way traffic
When conditions permit you to drive at such a speed safely

questions.question: Always allow extra room in front of your vehicle when following:
For which of the following must you always stop your vehicle?
choices: Blacked out and malfunctioning traffic signals

questions.question: Mixing prescription drugs and alcohol is likely to:
Unmarked crosswalks are crosswalks not marked by painted lines. They exist:
choices: Everywhere a pedestrian crosses the street

questions.question: What is the leading cause of car skids?
The posted speed limit on a road is 55 mph. When there is packed snow on this road:
For everyday driving, you should grip the steering wheel by approximately:
Your lane ends ahead, and there is a large truck in the lane beside you. What is the best thing to do?
choices: Slow down and merge behind the truck
Stay alongside the truck and assume that the truck will slow down
Speed up and merge in front of the truck. You have the right-of-way

questions.question: Before you can qualify for a probationary license when you are under 18 years, you must hold an instruction permit for at least:
What does a sign with eight sides mean?
If a railroad crossing is marked only with a Crossbuck sign, you should:
choices: Always stop and only proceed when it is safe to do so
Reduce speed, look both ways, and listen for audible signal whistle
Slow down if a railroad engine is approaching within approximately 500 feet

questions.question: If you are involved in a collision, you must always:
choices: File an accident report with the DMV
Immediately move injured people out of the traffic lane

questions.question: Passing another vehicle to the right on an unpaved shoulder is:
choices: Allowed if the other vehicle is going too slowly
Allowed if the other vehicle is turning left

questions.question: Which car or cars have the position for a left turn on this one-way street?
choices: Any of the cars in the three lower lanes (marked B, C, and D)
The car in the extreme left lane (marked D)
Any of the cars in the two left lanes (marked C and D)

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
If a school bus with flashing red lights has stopped on your side of an undivided highway with four or more lanes, you must:
choices: Slow down and proceed with caution

questions.question: Being tired when driving causes you to:
choices: Be more comfortable behind the wheel
Take more time to make decisions

questions.question: You may cross a double solid yellow line:
choices: At any time if it is safe to do so
When making a safe left turn

questions.question: When you proceed on a solid green light, you must:
choices: Give the right-of-way to vehicles in the intersection
Yield to oncoming vehicles making a left turn

questions.question: This sign means:
choices: Right turn permitted on green arrow only

questions.question: Which lane should you use for a left turn?
choices: Lane A with steady red X,
Lane B with flashing yellow X
Lane C with steady green arrow

questions.question: When should you give a sharp blast on your horn?
choices: When you want someone to get out of the way
When another driver fails to use a turn signal
When you have lost control of your vehicle and are moving towards someone

questions.question: What is a suitable restraint system for a child three years old and weighing less than 40 pounds?
When you follow a snowplow with its warning lights on, you should:
If you spot an emergency ahead, causing you to slow down or stop when other drivers may not expect it, you should:
choices: Tap your brake pedal a few times

questions.question: What is true about driving on a wet roadway?
choices: As you drive faster, your tires become less effective
Water does not affect cars with good tires

questions.question: When driving on a limited-access roadway with several lanes, you should avoid the following:
choices: Adjusting your speed to allow others to enter the highway safely
Using the middle or left-hand lane if you are traveling slower than other traffic
Staying at least three seconds behind the vehicle ahead of you

questions.question: If you see a pedestrian with a white cane at a crosswalk, you should:
choices: Stop and turn off your engine, so it is clear that you have stopped
Give the pedestrian the right-of-way at all times

questions.question: When you see a truck preparing for a right turn ahead, you should:
choices: Pass on the right before the truck has completed the turn

questions.question: As the percentage of alcohol in your blood increases, you become more:
A leaky exhaust system in your vehicle is dangerous because it can cause:
On their second and subsequent convictions Probationary license holders will have the demerit points on their driving record:
Which is true about parking 20 feet from a railroad crossing?
choices: It is allowed if there are two lanes or more in each direction
It is allowed, unless there is a sign that prohibits parking

questions.question: Which is not a factor in determining the distance it takes to stop your vehicle:
A yield sign in your lane:
choices: Means the same as a stop sign or flashing red signal
Means you must slow down or stop, until the way is clear
Always gives you the right of way

questions.question: On cold, wet days, which of the following roadways is most likely to hide spots of ice?
Which of the following vehicles must always stop before crossing railroad tracks?
choices: A passenger car with young children

questions.question: This sign alerts you to:
Which is true about car/deer crashes?
choices: They are more frequent around midnight when it is dark
They can be avoided by flashing your high-beam headlights
They can occur at any time of the year

questions.question: You are driving on a one-way street. You may turn left onto another one-way street only if:
choices: Traffic on the street flows to the left
There is a sign permitting the turn
Traffic on the street flows to the right

questions.question: The following are true about large trucks except:
choices: They have bigger blind spots than most cars

questions.question: Why should you be prepared to stop when approaching a railroad crossing and there is a truck with a hazardous load ahead?
choices: The truck will stop at the crossing
You should never cross within 500 feet of the truck
The truck will drive slower when crossing the railroad

questions.question: Which is always illegal in Wisconsin?
choices: Removing a coat or jacket while driving
Having an unrestrained dog inside the car

questions.question: You can legally park your car in front of a public driveway:
choices: If you park for less than 30 minutes
If the driveway is in front of your house

questions.question: State laws say:
When passing a safety zone without a posted speed limit and where a bus has stopped to load or unload, you must:
Which road signs have a five-sided shape?
choices: School advance and school crossing signs

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
The legal drinking age for alcohol is:
To avoid last-minute braking or the need to turn, you should:
choices: Focus on the road in front of you
Drive slower than vehicles around you

questions.question: If you have a green light and an intersection is blocked by vehicles, you should:
This sign means you are traveling:
If you get 6 demerit points on your driving record within any 12 months:
choices: You will receive a warning letter
You must pay a driver responsibility fee

questions.question: How do seat belts help you when you drive?
choices: They keep you behind the wheel if you are hit from the side
They help to prevent all types of traffic accidents
They help you stay awake and alert

questions.question: What is the best advice if you encounter an aggressive driver?
choices: Keep your cool and get out of the way

questions.question: A dashed yellow center line:
choices: May be crossed when the right half of the roadway is closed, even if it is not safe to do so
May be crossed when passing other vehicles, but only if it is safe to do so

questions.question: You must turn on your headlights:
choices: When you come within 500 feet of an oncoming vehicle

questions.question: When the temperature is around the freezing point, and ice becomes wet:
choices: You should increase your speed to get a better traction
Roads are more slippery than at temperatures well below freezing
Bridges and overpasses are usually dry and safe

questions.question: Which traffic light has the same meaning as a stop sign?
It is a good idea to give your horn a light tap when:
choices: Passing a bicycle in a narrow lane
You want another driver to get out of the way
Passing a driver who starts to turn into your lane

questions.question: Looking at least 10 seconds ahead of your vehicle might help you to avoid:
The areas around trucks where vehicles disappear into blind spots are often called no-zones. These areas include:
choices: The sides of the truck only
Both sides, rear, and front of the truck
The front and rear of the truck only

questions.question: What is the meaning of this sign?
When two vehicles arrive at the same time at an uncontrolled intersection, which should have the right-of-way?
choices: The vehicle approaching from the right

questions.question: Which of the following is considered unsafe driving on a high-speed roadway?
choices: Going to the next exit when you miss your exit
Keeping to the right when driving slower than other vehicles

questions.question: This hand position on the steering wheel is:
choices: Only recommended when driving long distances
The best way to hold the steering wheel at all times

questions.question: One of the leading causes of fatalities at railroad crossings is:
choices: Trains not using a whistle or horn
Drivers assuming a train is not coming

questions.question: If you are involved in a traffic crash, and someone is injured, it is generally wrong to:
What does a solid yellow line on a two-lane road indicate?
The driver ahead signals:
Which is true about swinging wide to the left before making a right-hand turn?
choices: It is safe as long as you use your turn signals and insist on the right-of-way
The driver behind you may think you are changing lanes and may try to pass you on the right
It helps you make a safe turn and alert drivers and pedestrians of your intentions

questions.question: If a school bus with flashing red lights has stopped on the other side of an undivided roadway with two lanes, you must:
choices: Stop only when the bus has stopped in a loading zone

questions.question: A Class D instruction permit is valid for:
Orange road signs indicate:
If a police or traffic officer asks you to take an alcohol concentration (BAC) test:
choices: You may refuse if you haven't been involved in an accident
You may refuse if you haven't been drinking

questions.question: What should you expect ahead if you see this sign?
Driving under the influence of a drug that impairs your ability to drive safely is:
choices: Only illegal if the drug is illegal
Legal if it is a prescription drug or an over-the-counter drug

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
choices: You cannot turn left from this lane
You can only turn left from this lane

questions.question: When a traffic signal is showing a flashing red light, you must:
choices: Stop completely, only proceed when it is safe to do so
Slow down, crossing traffic must always stop
Stop and remain stopped until a green signal appears

questions.question: If you were parking your car next to the curb here, which way should you turn your wheels?
